Elliptic umbilic bifurcation set (codimension three): for fixed z , the section of the bifurcation set is a three-cusped astroid x=\tfrac{1}{3}z^{2}(-\cos\left(2\phi\right)-2\cos\phi),y=\tfrac{1}{3}z^{2}(\sin\left(2\phi\right)-2\sin\phi), , if 0\leq\phi\leq 2\pi.
Elliptic umbilic cusp lines (ribs): x+iy=-z^{2}\exp\left(\tfrac{2}{3}i\pi m\right), if m=0,1,2.
